free: #e "Today is our Tombsweeping Day,"
#c 「今天咱們來聊聊掃墓節的事。」

free: #e "How do you pay respects to the dead in Tungho?"
#c 「你們東河的人是怎樣祭祖掃墓呢。」

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "If we go there at dawn."

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Whoever arrives ahead, to arrive ahead is good."
#c 「我們那邊如果早上 ... ... 今天呀，看看誰先到，如果最先到的就最好了。」

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Whoever comes last will get a scolding."
#c 「誰最晚到，就會被罵說：『為什麼會這麼晚到呢？』」

free: #e "We do some weeding."

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Every member of the clan should be there."
#c 「如果我們也（去掃墓），那們全姓的人就要通通都來。」

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "The weeding should have been finished (once all the clans have arrived)."

free: #e "How could you consume everything if you buy too much food?"
#c 「如果沒有太多人來,那如何吃完所有的東西呢?」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "You have to take them home."
#c 「要把它們帶到家裡。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "From the graveyard, are the food taken home still going to be distributed?"
#c 「如果從墓地回來,還要再分(帶回家的食物)嗎?」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "They are sliced at the graveyard."
#c 「在墓園那裡切成一塊一塊的。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Then they are distributed to the people gathered there."
#c 「就集中在那兒分東西。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "In rituals like this, everybody in the neighborhood goes."
#c 「像這樣的祭拜,全部都要去。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Once we finish, we separate ways and go home."
#c 「如果拜完了,我們就各自回家。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "If somebody wants to have lunch, they sometimes (come) to my house."
#c 「從遠地來的人,如果有人要吃中飯,有時候可以去我那邊。」
#n ma isaa是固定用詞。
#n Note: ma isaa is a fixed expression.

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "They either come to Mini's house or to Kalih-a-taaw's house."
#c 「他們可能到Mini的家或到Kalih-a-taaw的家。」
#n mini'是朱先生弟弟的名字。Note: mini' is Chu's younger brother

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "They themselves decide where to have lunch."
#c 「他們自己決定要在誰那裡吃午餐。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Each clan makes their own decisions."
#c 「要各個姓氏自己決定。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "The Fengs have their lunch at the Feng homes."
#c 「風姓的人在風家吃午餐」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "The offerings brought from the cemetery"
#c 「從墓地帶回祭品。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Who gets more?"
#c 「誰（拿到）的多一點。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "It didn't matter."
#c 「沒關係。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "All the offerings are gathered together, sliced and eaten."
#c 「所有的祭品全部集合一起，切一切來吃。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "It was bad last year."
#c 「去年就不好。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Before the meal even started, people were already packing food for themselves."
#c 「還沒開始吃之前，有人已經在搶著打包他們要吃的了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "The elders were still gathered for meeting when people started eating."
#c 「當其他人在吃的時候，（為了大家的聚會）老人還在收。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "(After the meeting was over and) they were ready to eat, all the food was gone."
#c  「（等到聚會已經結束，老人）他們準備要吃，所有吃的東西都沒了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "(The food were already) packed."
#c 「（吃的東西都）打包好了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "It was so bad last year."
#c 「去年很不好。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "They were already told ( ... ) this year."
#c 「今年他們已經被說了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "The situation has improved."
#c 「情況已經改善了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Don't pack (before everybody has eaten)."
#c 「(大家還沒吃之前)不打包。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Eat first, then if there are any leftovers (that nobody wants),"
#c 「先吃，如果還有剩下的（lit.別人不要的）,」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08
朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "It's up to yourself."
#c 「看你自己了。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Don't mention about distributing the food. That's taboo. If say you want to bring home food, then you go ahead."
#c 「別提怎麼分配食物，那是不能說的，如果你想要帶回家，直接做就好了」
#n 'a'apol詞義為「分發」，並沒有重疊部分。
#n Note: 'a'apol af 'distribute'. There is no morphological reduplication in this word.

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Today it's like"
#c 「今天就像是那樣。」
#n IU#229 與音檔有出入
#n Note: transcription of IU 229 is different from sound file.

free: #e "There were not many people before, which is good."
#c 「以前人不多, 很好。」

meta.speaker: 朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "At tomb-sweeping, everybody gets down below the cemetery to sit down."
#c 「如果來拜拜（拜好之後）在交叉路口休息。」

朱阿良, kalaeh a oemaw, male, 1928-08-08

free: #e "Good to eat. Not much food. They're placed on the ground."
#c 「可以吃的不多。」

#c 「把東西擺在地上, 坐著就吃了, 乾杯。」

free: #e "It's not the same nowadays. Once you start to drink, you tend to drink too much. There was not much wine in those days."
#c 「現在不一樣了, 如果一喝酒就喝多. 以前酒也不多。」
